Articles.Content:
http://i.imgur.com/Prn1E6t.png

Wait, are those shock diamonds in this mod?

Finally a good reason to use the poodle!

I'm also glad people are working on new SRB effects, they look great.

Request:

Can you make "dust effects" when landing on places like the Mun? Somehow activating a dust particle FX when you reach a certain low altitude with the engine on?

Obviously I'm not developing these, but I think that would require a custom plugin. However, I don't think it would be "particle"-ly difficult to write But it would require having different effects for each body, and some other things.

How about making the particle effects larger as the atmosphere thins? With FAR particularly..

Other then that I was thinking about some like this last night. LOVE the SRB effects.

Another question.. Is it possible to lower the speed at which the condensation cloud forms? Over powered rocket the other day just looked.. right. Until it caught on fire.

Request:

Can you make "dust effects" when landing on places like the Mun? Somehow activating a dust particle FX when you reach a certain low altitude with the engine on?

An example can be found on this video:

(Around 6:00 min)

I am planning to do these as soon as someone with plugin making skills joins. And not only this but also expanding exhaust according to pressure, condensation between multiple engines, proper condensation on engines in high altitude (not anymore near the ground), ground and water billowing effects, launch pad side exhausts, reentry long duration trails and maybe more..
I will get this when there are shock diamonds and air pressure-specific fx. The new fx look a bit more dirty.

I am planning to do these as soon as someone with plugin making skills joins. And not only this but also expanding exhaust according to pressure, condensation between multiple engines, proper condensation on engines in high altitude (not anymore near the ground), ground and water billowing effects, launch pad side exhausts, reentry long duration trails and maybe more..

I'd be willing to hop on, at least to get you started (there are better plugin writers than myself). I think the launch pad side exhausts and the dust would be possible and within my abilities, I don't know about the rest. In any case, I'm working on a proof of concept dust kickup plugin at the moment.

I love those FX! I have a question, though. Could you make at least one more set for hypergolic rockets? There are none in the stock game, but FASA has plenty of good examples, for instance.

Also, did you see RealFuels mod? A collaboration would be really awesome, especially if the engine FX would change with the engine type. Your NERVA exhaust does a good job of looking like hydrolox exhaust of Delta IV, while Mainsail resembles most kerolox rockets. Solids are spot-on, too. Poodle looks kerolox, too, albeit a bit less realistic. You could make a Space Shuttle-style exhaust (faint, blue-ish hydrolox, it burned hotter than Delta IV), and a hypergolic-type one (see Proton and Titan, despite different fuels, flames looked similar). Perhaps also a clear, stron blue one, for methane (

) and related fuels. There's a huge amount of fuels and their combinations in RSS, so additional effects would greatly enhance the mod.
Tweaks for speed are coming today, along with this
I wonder if this work could be adapted to put dust trails behind my rovers.

This is a nice looking mod but I think the particles should move much faster as they seem like they are in slow motion. If you cut the engine and move the spacecraft, what is left of the exhaust trail also moves with the spacecraft. Speeding it up would make it less noticeable.

TELL US OUR SECRET XD.

Aerospace is in! It'll be ready to download very soon.
Are you planning to add support for other mods?

Are you planning to add support for other mods?

The FX support other mods, if a mod author or user edits their cfg files to point to my fx.

I'm drooling right now. The rest of the game looks so ugly compared to this state-of-the-art particle effects.

Request:

Can you make "dust effects" when landing on places like the Mun? Somehow activating a dust particle FX when you reach a certain low altitude with the engine on?

An example can be found on this video:

(Around 6:00 min)

Those particular dust effects are inaccurate: The lack of atmosphere on the Moon means no gases for the dust to interact with to form clouds. Instead, when it is blasted away, the particles travel in a parabolic arc, similar to the way heavier particles like sand or gravel fly here on Earth.

Different angle:

http://i.imgur.com/migw2w8.gif

GIVE IT TO ME NOW!
Alright I figured out how to add these to mod engines. The only problem I have is that they are kind of slow. If you could speed them up a bit that would be nice.
